name: Nobody Eats Alone Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a social networking application platform intended to encourage people to meet offline. The company's platform helps to discover fun activities happening around and see who's joining, enabling users to meet up, have fun and get notified about upcoming events and activities.
one_liner: Operator of a social networking application platform intended to encourage people to meet offline. The company's platform helps to discover fun activities happening around and see who's joining, enabling users to meet up, have fun and get notified about upcoming events and activities.
